about_the_game:
Step into the unpredictable shoes of our axe-wielding hero in "I made this Game in 3 Days"! Yep, you read that right – three days of caffeine-fueled coding produced this comedic masterpiece. Get ready to embark on a ghostly adventure that's so basic, it's anything but.

Swing your mighty axe and unleash your not-so-fancy sword attack on hordes of ghosts – because when life gives you spectral lemons, you make... ghostade? Our hero might not be the sharpest tool in the shed, but they sure know how to handle a pixelated weapon!

Ghosts. That's it. These transparent troublemakers are your only foes, but don't let their lack of variety fool you – they've got spunk, and they're not afraid to flaunt it. Swing your axe like there's no tomorrow, because you never know when a mischievous bug will turn you into a floating sandwich.

Explore the stunning realm of "I made this Game in 3 Days," where every corner is a surprise and every glitch is a standing ovation for creativity. And hey, if you ever wanted to be an open-source hero, now's your chance! Tweak the quirky code, craft your own oddball mods, and share them with fellow adventurers who appreciate a good laugh.

So, grab your digital battle axe, summon your courage (and your inner coder), and dive headfirst into a world where basic meets hilariously bizarre. Because in this game, we take "simple" to a whole new level. Bugs and all, are you up for the challenge?

Credits:
- Store Assets: lui.gg
- Game Assets: kenney.nl
- Game Music: Kim Lightyear
- Game Testers (Trailer): lui.gg & LastNote
- Tutorial: Firebelley Games

Swing your mighty axe and unleash your not-so-fancy sword attack on hordes of ghosts – because when life gives you spectral lemons, you make... ghostade? Our hero might not be the sharpest tool in the shed, but they sure know how to handle a pixelated weapon!

Ghosts. That's it. These transparent troublemakers are your only foes, but don't let their lack of variety fool you – they've got spunk, and they're not afraid to flaunt it. Swing your axe like there's no tomorrow, because you never know when a mischievous bug will turn you into a floating sandwich.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a buggy adventure in "I made this Game in 3 Days"! I'm not kidding when I say this roguelike masterpiece was birthed in just 72 hours. Dive headfirst into a realm of whimsical chaos, where every bug is a feature and every glitch is a delightful surprise.
